elements.label: Monica, an acquaintance
elements.description: Monica toured some of the most prestigious dueling fraternities in Germany, before her father found out. She had to leave the country, but her skill remained with her. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Monica, a believer
elements.description: Monica's wit is almost as sharp as her blade. Both serve us well.

elements.label: Monica, a disciple
elements.description: Monica handles herself with discipline and grace, and is all the more deadlier for it.

elements.label: Monica, an Assassin
elements.description: A single strike is all Monica needs. She takes pride in the meticulousness of her work.

elements.label: Monica, a Troublemaker
elements.description: Monica has decided that brotherhoods are not for her after all.

elements.label: Monica, a Rival
elements.description: We have been sent a white, satin dueling glove. 'To formalize things', the attached note says.

elements.label: Monica, a Long in the Making
elements.description: Monica handles herself like nobility, and wields her rapier with surgical precision. She makes for a most formidable foe now.

elements.label: Monica, a Prisoner
elements.description: Monica demands satisfaction on the field of battle. We ignore her requests.
